poem:
**The Dark Parade**

In the shadows of cyberspace,
a candidate dons a twisted mask,
declaring himself both taboo and tyrant,
a "black NAZI!" he types, 
as if history were a joke, 
as if decency were an old coat 
to be discarded.

The parade of absurdities marches on,
and we watch, bewildered, 
at the carnival of our time.
